text: gi rasa winisa: mage mathake obe ruwa mage mathake obe ruwa mage mathake obe ruwa ande suhada ma jiwithe oba sathuyi obe suwanda manamath karayi oba ma hade sarisarayi aatha epitin obe asena pem githaye sitha sandapane kiri sayura kalatha soyayi mahada kawuluwa dorin enna suhade oya jiwithe aadaren inna mata lanwela sitha sulangak hama pathuwa pathuman gena aatha bhawaye patan pathuma lesa lan kala oolu manel pipi suwanda pini ha weli sondura oya muhuna midum selen wasi gayanaya: sujatha aththanayaka ha ech. aar. jothipala sinama pataya: minisun athara minisek rangapama: gamini fonseka ha wina jayakodi aasiyathikayo swabhawayenma kuda minisun wethi.

sanwardhana kriyawaliyedi patu deshapalana mathawadawala sirawa sitima rate anagathayata ahithakara bawa wiruddha mathadharin me mathiwaranaya maginwath therum gatha yuthu yayi shri lanka nidahas pakshaye maha lekam saukhya amathi maithripala sirisena mahatha pawasiya.janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathage dakma matha rajaya wisin kriyathmaka karana lada sanwardhana kriyadamaya shri lankeya janathawa yalith warak piligena thibena bawa pawasu amathiwaraya methek wicharuddha matha daru piris deshapalana ediriwadikam amathaka kara nagi sitiya yuthu bawata paniwidaya me mathiwaranaya magin di athayi sandahan keleya.amathiwaraya mese pawasuwe palath palana chanda wimasimedi eksath janatha nidahas sandhanaya lada wishishta jayagrahanaya pilibanda adahas dakwamini.sandhanaye jayagrahanaya wenuwen chandaya bhawitha kala saha mathiwarana wyaparaya sarthaka kara ganimata dayaka wu siyalu denatath sthuthiya pala karana amathiwaraya, prajathanthrawadaya garu karana pakshayak washayen wiruddha mathadharinta da sthuthiya pala karana bawa kiweya.palath palana mathiwaranaya thulin thora ganunu niyojithayan samanga ekwa rata godanangimata aditan kathara gatha yuthu bawa pawasu amathiwaraya jayagrahanayen uddama nowi siya wagakim itu kirimata katayuthu kala yuthu bawath kiweya..
